ColourGUIShader Class Reference

This class is a GUI shader that shades the colours of the components it is applied to. More...

#include <colour_gui_shader.hpp>

class  ThisAttributeMap
 internal More...

Detailed Description

This class is a GUI shader that shades the colours of the components it is applied to.

void ColourGUIShader::constants ( const Vector4 &  colour1,
const Vector4 &  colour2,
const Vector4 &  colour3,
float  param,
float  speed = 1.f 
)

Constants for colour shader : 1 ) the colour at t = 0 2 ) the colour at t = 0.5 3 ) the colour at t = 1 4 ) the current value 5 ) the speed ( the time required to move T-value to new value ).

float  dTime 
) [virtual]

This method processes a GUI component, applying this shader to its vertices.

Parameters:
component The component to process
dTime The delta time for the current frame of the application

void ColourGUIShader::reset (  ) 

This method resets the colour of the shader to be exactly the destination.

It bypasses any inherent animation to the target colour.
